researchAreas.title: Learning Analytics in Educational Settings
researchAreas.description: Using computational approaches to understand teaching and learning processes across educational contexts.
coreQuestions: How can we analyze educational discourse to improve teaching and learning?
What aspects of effective teaching can be modeled and studied systematically?
How do we evaluate and improve educational dialogues in diverse learning contexts?
publications: Simulated Teaching and Learning at Scale: Balancing Fidelity and Effectiveness in Tutoring Interactions

researchAreas.title: Educational Data Science
researchAreas.description: Applying quantitative methods to analyze educational phenomena and improve learning outcomes.
coreQuestions: How can data science methods enhance our understanding of learning?
What patterns emerge when analyzing educational discourse at scale?
How can statistical models help us understand student learning trajectories?
publications: Large Language Models: A New Lens for Examining Derivative Conceptions at Scale

researchAreas.title: Mathematical Knowledge for Teaching
researchAreas.description: Investigating the specialized knowledge needed for effective mathematics teaching, particularly for teacher preparation.
coreQuestions: What specialized knowledge do mathematics teachers need?
What tensions do instructors face when teaching mathematics to future teachers?
How can we assess and develop mathematical knowledge for teaching?
publications: Teaching Geometry for Secondary Teachers: What are the Tensions Instructors Need to Manage?

researchAreas.title: Technical Skills Education
researchAreas.description: Exploring innovative approaches to technical skills development with a focus on data science education.
coreQuestions: How can we create effective technical interview preparation experiences?
What role can technology play in personalized technical skill development?
How do we balance technology with human mentorship in technical education?
publications: Learning Through Technical Interviews: Combining Data Science Mentorship with AI-Powered Practice

researchAreas.title: Liberal Arts Education Outcomes
researchAreas.description: Examining the long-term impacts of liberal arts education on career trajectories and life outcomes.
coreQuestions: What are the long-term impacts of liberal arts education?
How does undergraduate writing experience influence later career outcomes?
What aspects of liberal arts education have the most lasting value?
publications: Alumni Perspectives on General Education: How Writing Can Increase What We Know

timelineEvents.event: Joined the Grasping Rationality and Instructional Practices (GRIP) Lab
timelineEvents.description: Began work on the Geometry for Teachers (GeT) Support Project under a $2.3 million NSF IUSE Grant.
Joined research team analyzing impacts of liberal arts education on life outcomes.

timelineEvents.event: Started Computational Analysis of Mathematics Education
timelineEvents.description: Began applying computational methods to analyze educational discourse at scale.
Initiated research on analyzing conceptual understanding in educational contexts using computational methods.
Served as Editorial Assistant for the Journal for Research in Mathematics Education.
Began research on technical interview preparation and AI-assisted practice.
Started research on evaluating technology-supported educational dialogues.
